category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 23 (Application mutatis mutandis of the General Assembly of Representatives, etc.)
contents: Article 23 (Application mutatis mutandis to the general meeting of delegates, etc.) ① The operation of the general meeting shall apply mutatis mutandis to the proceedings, remarks, deliberation of bills, preparation of minutes, etc. of the board of directors. ② The auditor and athlete village head may attend the board of directors meeting and state their opinions. ③ The minutes of paragraph 1 shall be signed and sealed by the chairman involved in the proceedings of the board of directors and one director appointed with the approval of the board of directors among those present. [Previous Article 22 moved to Article 23 on October 6, 2021]
